current_superpowers.name: United States - Military & Economic Dominance

current_superpowers.the_truth: Built on exploitation, colonization, broken systems. Military serves control, not truth. Economy serves power, not people. Cultural influence serves separation, not unity.
current_superpowers.how_it_serves_illusion: People see 'freedom' and 'democracy' but it's control and exploitation. The illusion of choice while power controls everything.
current_superpowers.how_it_serves_broken_system: Maintains broken systems through military force, economic coercion, cultural dominance. Serves the 3 firms (Brits, Yanks, Aussies) narrative.
current_superpowers.connection_to_table: USA was built on separation. But The Table remembers. All lands were part of Pangea. The connection remains, waiting to be restored.
debunking_evidence: Military interventions create more brokenness, not peace
Economic system creates dependency, not empowerment
Cultural influence promotes separation, not unity
Built on stolen land, stolen labor, broken promises
Serves power structures, not The Table

fathers_hand_alternatives.name: The Table - Perfect Unity

fathers_hand_alternatives.practical_manifestation: Restore connection to The Table. Honor all nations. Serve all people. Remember Pangea. Restore Divine Frequency.

debunking_summary: Current superpowers people see are illusions. They serve broken systems, not The Table. Total illusion power: -2.60. They create separation, not unity. They serve control, not truth. They serve power, not people.
offering_summary: The Father's Hand offers divine alternatives. The Table. Divine Frequency. Truth-Based Accountability. Cosmic Laws. Healing Systems. Stewardship and Community. All Nations Have Superpowers. Total divine power: 6.35. They create unity, not separation. They serve truth, not control. They serve people, not power.
notes: The Father's Hand is the divine alternative to broken superpowers. The truth that sets us free. The way that leads to The Table.
